name: places/ChIJ9Ui6omn2wokRBpQS6Dir9nk
adrFormatAddress: 3240 Broadway, New York, NY 10027, USA

originalText.text:
4.5/5 worries about my child’s safety was never an issue. Many of the teachers go the extra mile (and it was appreciated) and the director is completely professional and is attentive. You can tell that the staff and teachers have a love for children.

My child learned and grew so much at this daycare/ preschool and they have a good balance of fun and education here without putting too much on the children at the same time.

I would recommend.

originalText.text: My experience with CCDCC has been amazing finding them has truly been a blessing. The teachers and staff are very hands on, attentive, and caring. My son and I are treated like family. Every interaction is always warm and pleasant. We are greeted every morning with smiles and hugs. I’m proud my son is a part of CCDCC family. Ms.Gloria is truly amazing and a pleasure to work with. She helped me with enrolling my child and made the process less stressful with her kind nature. All the teachers are very helpful and help me outside of the school with tips on how to improve things with my son. I can go on and on about CCDCC. This place is heaven sent I have no worries knowing my child is in good hands.

originalText.text: The best day care hands down!! My son has been with this day care for 3 years. They've been an extended family to us. The teachers are very good at what they do.They love the kids like they love their own. CCDC3 has been the family day care for years. My son father and his family has been going there since they open. Even though my son time have been cut short during this pandemic, the school made sure the children was still learning, checked and updated us on everything. They will truly be missed!! Thank you to all the staff!!

originalText.text: My daughter had a wonderful experience at Citizen's Care. The staff has been very supportive and you feel the love they have for the children. My daughter was very happy here. I was sad that her experience  was cut off short due to the COVID pandemic. Despite of this, her teachers continued to check in with us. My only regret is that I didn't send her sooner. I would highly recommend this place to anyone in search of safe environment for their child to learn and grow. We can all use a bit peace of mind knowing our children will be well cared for.

originalText.text: CCDCC3 is an amazing head start. I've had both of my children there. The staff are kind and supportive! Highly recommend.
